parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mines

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns [[true]] if mine has been detected by a given side

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> mine '''mineDetectedBy''' faction

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> mine: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> faction: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>([[allMines]] [[select]] 0) [[mineDetectedBy]] [[west]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allMines]], [[detectedMines]], [[createMine]], [[mineActive]], [[revealMine]]
</value></part></template></root>
